reviewText: The 2 movies were funny.Hello Again was not funny, that movie was boring and stunk. The other 2 were good.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: You couldn't ask for better situation comedy "Taking care of Business" is a hoot.Mr Destiny is a fine almost sci-fi love comedy story almost a time travel story.This is an enjoyable story of a wife who died and through witchcraft was brought back to life a year later which created many problems for the husband.All three movies on this disc is worth buying. They are a hoot...
summary: All three movies are clean-cut comedy
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I only bought this for Mr. Destiny. I seen so long ago and liked it. One more for the collection.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: This DVD gives you three great movies, at a great bargain prize,. I enjoyed watching the tree movies very much!
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I love these movies, they're very entertaining, the only thing I hate is the language in them, but I guess if I'm going to watch them I have to overlook that.  Funny Funny movies though

reviewText: I watched these movies when they were first made and enjoyed them then as well as now.  They're good clean f-u-u-u-n!!!

reviewText: bought this for Hello Again, the story line not plausible of bringing someone back after death, but this movie is a riot, some great laughsand one is sympathetic for Shelly Longs' character, Corbin Bernsesn is great as the husband, soon not to be, and judith Ivey is fabulous as the altrnative health and occult shop owner.Taking Care  of Business is one of James Belushi's funniest, and Mr Destiny is for anyone that loves baseball.
summary: Taking care of Business, Mr Destiny  and Hello Again
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: OK - light comedy.  Not great, but ok.  For the price I am not disappointed. Some good lines in each movie to get a laugh now and again.dlp
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I thought this was a funny and enjoyable movie. It is a very funny movie and also it is a movie that you would watch more than once.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I just adore 80's movies! These are classics and a good watch. And ones that make sense together in a combo pack....you don't get that often enough.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: A good movie floats my boat and here are 3 good ones.  I'm not a big collector of DVD's but when a good deal like this one comes along, I can't resist.  After watching Taking Care of Business it takes 3 days to get the song out of my head!!!  Entertaining and that's all I want from these movies.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I could not believe when I search for Hello Again on DVD it came with two fantastic bonus movies.WOW! Well, there was no refusing it I had to buy the package.Best entertainment.If you like James Belushi, Michael Caine and Shelley Long,you;ll love this triple feature,...funny...funny...funny!
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: excellent trio of comedy this grouping of comedy movies is wonderful a little something for everyone would recommend it to everyone. seller did a excellent job on their part too.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I love every single movie and like that it's in one CD.  Each movie is great and I'm a big fan of James Belushi and Shelly Long.  Can't go wrong if you purchase this one.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I'm not sure if you could call this "Triple Feature" a Jim Belushi Retrospective or not, but there are several well-known actors and actresses in these films that make them enjoyable, even if the plots are a little thin. Mr. Destiny is my favorite because of the "fate thing" and the "what-if" scenarios going on. With name actors/actresses like Michael Caine, Rene Russo, and Linda Hamilton, you can't go wrong. And the classic cars! It was a fun film.
summary: Two Out of Three Ain't Bad
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I lucked out and got three for one.  I wanted Hello Again and got Mr. Destiny also. Have yet to see Taking care of Business, but think that James Belushi is a good actor and has a background in comedy that stands the test of time. Shelly Long ---  what to say about her except she has always delivered a fine performance in what ever film she is in.  I love her speech patterns when she is delivering the punch lines.  Can not miss with this trio.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: Taking care of Business is the one I wanted most of all, since this was the only way I could get it, it's why I bought this. I have never seen either one of the other two movies. I will watch eventually. I like the idea of the prison break in Taking Care of Business, with a funny twist.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I got this dvd for " Hello Again" which I had seen  on TV, but all 3 movies are fun to watch. I would recomend them for all ages, You won't be disapointed. "Taking Care of Business" and "Mr. Destiny" have lessons for us all.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: Spin off from It's a wonderful Life.  The other movies were decent 80's movies I hadn't ever seen. I had issues with the packing as the case was broken & one of the DVDs was scratched.
summary: Mostly got this for Mr. Destiny

reviewText: SOOOOOO WORTH BUYING I LOVED EACH ONE OF THESE MOVIES WORTH WATCHING GREAT CAST IN EACH MOVIE SO I DO RECOMMEND IT

reviewText: THESE THREE MOVIES ARE AMAZING. THE 80S AT ITS BEST AND DEFINATELY NOT A DISAPPOINTMENT.  HELLO AGAIN IS GREAT. GIVE IT A GO
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I had read conflicting reviews on this title as far as the aspect ratio. I HATE MOVIES THAT HAVE BEEN REFORMATTED FROM THEIR ORIGINAL ASPECT RATIO, ESPECIALLY WHEN THEY'RE CHANGED TO "FULL SCREEN" WHICH IS 1.33. Since the present and future of HD TVs is 16x9, it would be stupid for any company to release reformatted movies in full screen. I was suspicious of the amazon listing because it lists the triple feature from millcreek as being released in 2012. I went to the millcreek web site and finally found that they list the official aspect ratios as 1.85:1, not 1.33 as amazon lists. I am attaching a link to a pdf on their web site if you care to judge for yourself.  This is enough for me to take a chance on this.[...]
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I bought this for the movie Mr. Destiny but the other 2 movies are also good.  In Mr. Destiny Larry played by James Belushi gets to see how his life would have turned out if one incident in his past 20 years ago had turned out different.  Isn’t this something we all had wished for at one time or another.  Just remember the old saying be careful what you wish for.
summary: James Belushi in Mr. Destiny is Fantastic
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: Taking care of business was what i was looking for, got the bonus of having Mr. Destiny I thoroughly enjoy both movies.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: I actually bought this for just "Hello Again." It's an awesome movie. I haven't indulged in the other movies on this order but will.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: This is a great trio of comedies from the Disney-folk (Touchstone, Hollywood Pictures, etc.). All have been severely underrated imho. My wife agrees w/ me...these should be given another viewing/reviewing and it's good to see them get a second chance for a fun, wacky and zany time to be had by all who choose to view them.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: What a great casting in all three movies. I love all three. I just watched Taking Care of Business and cant wait to see the other two.  A must have movie.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature

reviewText: Mr. Destiny and Taking Care of Business are certainly not destined for classic status.  Of course, who would be expecting that?  Instead, they are great light fun and vehicles for Belushi to play his shtick.  Basically, some excellent escapist fare from the pains of reality.  Taking Care of Business is the better of the two, in my opinion, with a fine performance from Charles Grodin who really helps make the film.I haven't watched Hello Again.
Title: Taking Care of Business & Mr. Destiny + Hello Again - Triple Feature
